summary: A teenage girl travels to Paris in the 1970s trying to find out about her sister's suicide, and falls in love with her dead sister's boyfriend.
cast: Cameron Diaz|Jordana Brewster|Christopher Eccleston|Blythe Danner|Camilla Belle|Patrick Bergin|Isabelle Pasco|Moritz Bleibtreu|Philipp Weissert|Nikola Obermann|Robert Getter|Ricky Koole|Marianne Hettinger|St√©phanie Lanier|Edward Olive
title: The Invisible Circus
